name: Hybrid Harmony Demo
description:
Hybrid Harmony is a romantic comedy visual that takes place in a modern fantasy world filled with mythical creatures, magic, and Hybrids! Hybrids are people that are a mixture between Human and mythical race, i.e., mermaids, werewolves, leprechauns, lamia, etc. (This is only the demo version of the game, comprised of the edited prologue!)

Kickstarter:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/enchantedworkshop/hybrid-harmony-a-modern-f...
